entry.title: Jason the Milch Cow
entry.summary:
Author: sarriathmg

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,697Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: Jason is Dick’s slave cow. That means it’s his job to satisfy his master sexually and provide him with fresh milk. One day, Dick shows Jason a news article about a new body modification procedure that can increase milk production in human cows by fifty percent. The best part is, it’s patented by Wayne Enterprises, and family and friends can get the procedure for free. How can a cow owner pass up an opportunity like that?

entry.title: You are precious to me.
entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 145,367Chapters: 53/?Kudos: 312

Summary: Damian had been sexually assaulted and after that his father saw the video, he just want to run away. That is how he end up living with Dick. Dick is conflicated about his feelings for Jason. Damian is now under his care and him and Bruce are still awkward around each other. And something is up with Tim but he doesn't know what. Jason is waiting for Dick to give him a proper answer. His hate for Bruce is too strong and he do not feel welcome in their perfect little family. or Everyone is dealing with things and their family is slowly falling appart. Would they succeed to all get along and get over the mistakes of the past?

entry.title: Blind Faith
entry.summary:
Author: AxisMage

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 229,929Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 219

Summary: It's no one's fault but his own that Dick is sitting there now, cold and utterly miserable, and very close to freezing to death. It's no one's fault but his own that he let his heart and mind get away again. It's no one's fault but his own that he wanted for someone who couldn't and wouldn't be his, and Wally is right. Dick needs to get back to his life, start over and make new friends. That's all, nothing more and nothing less. Friends, Dick needs friends, and sadly (according to Wally), Krypto isn't enough.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 216,121Chapters: 46/53Kudos: 1,661

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.summary:
Author: MewSefet

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,122Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 139

Summary: What happens when you accidently start dating your son's English teacher? When Dick and Jason find themselves pushed together on a rainy day in their usual coffee shop, neither of them expect their lives are already intertwined. How casual flirting and mutual interest turns into dating, turns into an identity reveal that neither of them expect, but should have figured out earlier. entry.title: like the moon, i must constantly question, who did i kill for this silk?
entry.summary:
Author: skinnedknees (honeysugarchocolate)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,490Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 22

Summary: Dick would be lying if he said he wasn't snagged on those stygian eyes and the arrogance that dripped down those lips. "So if I'm playing along correctly, you're saying this is where I throw my car keys on the table?" "I don't think a car would cut it, frankly," the man returns. He stares at Dick and Dick feels it like energy warbling through his fingers, like an aching flow of magma that drools down his skin. It is as indecipherable as it is intense. And that’s when Dick realizes that it must be him. Jason Todd.

entry.title: What It Sounds Like
entry.summary:
Author: UltraCaffeinatedIvy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,884Chapters: 11/14Kudos: 121

Summary: Things are mostly looking up for Jason Todd. He’s finally earned a scholarship to Gotham Academy and has a place that actually feels like home. He knows it's not some kind of cosmic reward for getting through a rough past, living through Catherine's addictions, his dad up and disappearing, or any of the other shit he's had to put up with. You get dealt your hand in life, for better or —more likley— worse, and try to make the best of it. Then Dick Grayson steps in. Or Where Pamela Isley adopts Jason Todd. Enrolls him in Gotham Academy and Jason struggles being a normal teenager, having friends and, of course, falls in love with Dick Grayson in the process. A coming of age story.

entry.title: Bodies As Stained Glass
entry.summary:
Author: succeeding

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 167,741Chapters: 28/60Kudos: 912

Summary: Jason Todd's a lot of things— martial arts instructor, vigilante, lady's man— but a babysitter isn't one of them. That's what Bruce asks him to be when Robin, the oldest child of the Wayne family, leaves the Manor and moves to Gotham. She can't be that helpless, right? She's a grown woman. She was Batman's original, and only, sidekick. Surely she doesn't need watching. Turns out, she really does. OR: an AU of Glass, with female Dick Grayson. That one change alters an entire universe. Sequel to 'Impersonation Of Life'. NOTE 12-30-2025: I am back to writing after an injury. This fic will receive regular updates.
